Olympus Infinity Stylus

About

Well-designed, fun-to-use point-and-shoot 35mm film camera. It is light, compact, and ergonomic with brilliantly-simple controls

How to Use

Basic instructions for using the Olympus Infinity Stylus:

  1. Load film (done already)
  2. Slide open lens cover to expose the lens, it should click in place
  3. Look through the viewfinder and frame your shot
  4. Press the shutter gently to take the picture

Specifications

  • Lens: 35mm f/3.5
  • Year: 1991
